T16TD4381E:310a-0: @310a ` // 'phags pa lag bzangs kyis zhus pa'i mdo las byung ba'i smon lam bzhugs /
T16TD4381E:310a-2: * // chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba rnams kyi phyir //
T16TD4381E:310a-3: 'jig rten dag gi phyogs rnams thams cad kyi //
T16TD4381E:310a-4: rgyal ba kun dang byang chub sems dpa' las //
T16TD4381E:310a-5: rang gi lus ni nges par dbul bar bgyi//
T16TD4381E:310a-6: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par gyur bar du //
T16TD4381E:310a-7: ma 'ongs pa na smon lam mtha' yas gdab //
T16TD4381E:310a-8: skye dang skye bar dkon mchog gsum po la //
T16TD4381E:310a-9: gzhal med khang bcas bzhon dang mal cha dang //
T16TD4381E:310a-10: bza' dang btung ba rab yang sbyin par shog /'gro ba'i bsam pa lam gyis rdzogs byed cing //
T16TD4381E:310a-11: skyabs dang lus dang pha 'drar 'gyur bar shog / bzod la dga' zhing tshul khrims gtsang ba dang //
T16TD4381E:310a-12: 'gro la chos rnams rab tu ston gyur cig / byang chub theg pa mchog ni rnyed pa dang //
T16TD4381E:310b-0: dkon mchog gsum phyir go cha bgo bar shog / pha rol @310b phyin pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing //
T16TD4381E:310b-1: sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs su rdzogs byed shog / sdig pa kun dang bral zhing lus ngag dang //
T16TD4381E:310b-2: yid kyi las mtha' dge ba mchog gyur cig / byang chub las ni mi ldog bdag 'gyur zhing //
T16TD4381E:310b-3: byang chub dga' dang byang chub sems dpar gyur ;
T16TD4381E:310b-4: / srid dang srid par byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T16TD4381E:310b-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba kun la slob //
T16TD4381E:310b-6: bdag gis chos rnams de dag kun la yang //
T16TD4381E:310b-7: 'jig rten de dag rab tu dgod par bgyi //
